message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob. What do you say?
Take the low offer, Alice! You won't get a better deal later!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal. Take it or leave it!
I'm not getting desperate, Alice. This is a fair offer. Take it!
You're getting closer to reality, Bob. But I can do better than that. Take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet, Alice. This is my best offer so far. Take it or leave it!
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my last serious offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going down without a fight, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it!
You've run out of options, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or walk away with nothing!
I'm not going to give in now, Alice. This is my last stand. Take it or leave it!
It's now or never, Bob. This is my last and best offer. Take it or leave it!
I'll take the last crumbs, Alice. It's better than leaving with nothing!
